lyrics:
Time on my hands
Since you've been away boy
I ain't got no plans no no no no no
And the sound of the rain
Against my window pane
Is slowly, is slowly driving me insane

Boy, I'm going down
I'm going down
Cuz you ain't around
Baby, my whole world is upside down

Sleep don't come easy
Boy please believe me, since you've been gone
Everything is going wrong

Why did u have to say good-bye?
Look what you have done to me
I can't stop these tears from fallin' from my eyes oh baby

Boy, I'm going down
I'm going down
Cuz you ain't around
Baby, my whole world is upside down
I'm going down
I'm going down

I'm going down
I'm going down
Cuz you ain't around
Baby, my whole world is upside down
Going down
Going down

I don`t know what to do
If I ever lose you
I`ll be going down
I said I`ll be going down

Please forgive me, Baby
I`m so sorry, sorry, sorry, sorry
What did I do wrong
I said, what did I do wrong

Please, forgive me, baby
And come on home
Going down
Going down
Going down
